content.query:
create proc metadata.sp_insert_control_file_load @file_name varchar(100),@file_type varchar(100),@source_type varchar(100)
,@processed_to_staging bit,@md_insert_user varchar(100),@converted_to_json bit AS
declare @date datetime=getdate()
insert into [metadata].[control_file_load] VALUES
(@file_name,@file_type,@source_type,@processed_to_staging,'processing',@date,@md_insert_user,'1900-01-01','',@converted_to_json)



create proc metadata.sp_update_control_file_load @file_name varchar(100),@processed_to_staging bit,@status_message varchar(100)
,@md_update_user varchar(100) AS
declare @date datetime=getdate()
update [metadata].[control_file_load] SET md_update_user=@md_update_user,processed_to_staging=@processed_to_staging
,status_message=@status_message,md_update_datetime=@date
where file_name=@file_name
